install.name: Latest Events
install.author: HUBzero
install.copyright: Copyright 2005-2011 Purdue University. All rights reserved.
install.description: Displays a list of upcoming events.

param.name: startday
param.label: Start day
param.description: The day (number) the calendar should start on

param.name: max_events
param.label: Max events
param.description: The maximum number of events to display

param.name: mode
param.label: Display last month
param.description: Display the calendar for the previous month
param.option: Display events for current week and following week only
Display events for current week and following week, including past events

param.name: announcements
param.label: Announcements
param.description: Exclude events listed as announcments from the list.

param.name: days
param.label: Days
param.description: The range of days relative to current day to display events for mode 1 or 3

param.name: display_links
param.label: Display links
param.description: Display event titles as links to the 'details' com_events task which will display details of the event.

param.name: display_year
param.label: Display year
param.description: Display year when displaying dates in the non-customized event's listing.

param.name: display_date_style
param.label: Display date style
param.description: 1 (default is 0) disables the application of the css style 'mod_events_latest_date' to the displayed events. Use this when full customization of the display format is desired. See customFormat parameter below.

param.name: display_title_style
param.label: Display title style
param.description: 1 (default is 0) disables the application of the css style 'mod_events_latest_title' to the displayed event's title. Use this when full customization of the display format is desired. See customFormat parameter below.

param.name: no_repeat
param.label: No repeat events
param.description: Show event multiple times if it repeats

param.name: char_limit
param.label: Character limit
param.description: Character limit if displaying any content

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
